Articles.Content:
I dont know why im doing it but i made a blog

http://solarcolonies.weebly.com/

Im always thinking of how current planets and moons in our solar system will be once they have been settled and each have a decent population and their own cultures and economies and foreign relations with other colonies, I write short stories for each post describing a day in the life of someone living on each colony.
I don't read usually read blogs, but I like the idea of yours

1 hour ago, Clockwork13 said:

I don't read usually read blogs, but I like the idea of yours

Thanks its actually less of a blog really, Every day if i can i write an article about how a specific planet will be occupied by us in the future and i invent characters to represent the average person living there. By the way i uploaded an article about Venus, Stay tuned for more!
